Game.Name: Seirei Densetsu Lickle (Japan)
Game.plot: The Imperial Forgy has been invaded by Ta-Keed the Prince of Darkness! Only the owners of the Magic Bells can stop his forces from destroying the realm. Led by the mountaineering youth, Samson, a force of unlikely heroes sets out to banish evil forever! Become a fire-breathing dragon, a living statue of solid stone or a nimble and crafty mouse. Soar the skies and belch fire balls as Kikira the Dragon Lord! Crush enemy troops with fists of granite as Gamm the Rock Lord! Scurry past dangerous monsters while setting time bombs as K.O. the mouse! These creatures join Little Samson to form a unique and powerful alliance as the last hope for the Imperial Forgy!Cheat: Restore EnergyAt very end of the game on Normal mode, on the screen with the castle image and flashing light show, press Up, Down, Up, Down, Right, Left, Right, Left, A, B, A, and B. The effect will result when you start another game.Cheat: All PasswordsPasswords are 4 letters long. 1st is easy mode, 2nd is normal: [EASY | NORMAL].Cheat: Warp from Stage 1 to 7After the intro stages, Stage 1: Ruins normally leads to Stage 2: Sky (similar to the dragon's intro stage). However, you can jump directly to Stage 7: Bubble Cave (with the vanishing bubble platforms).
